original_text: He hath made the earth by his power, he hath established the world by his wisdom, and hath stretched out the heavens by his discretion.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 권능으로 땅을 지으셨고 그의 지혜로 세계를 세우셨고 그의 명철로 하늘을 펴셨으며

sentences.original_text: He hath made the earth by his power
he hath established the world by his wisdom
and hath stretched out the heavens by his discretion
